columns.name: HLR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the request record.

columns.name: HLR_NAME
columns.description: Record name

columns.name: HLR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Hospital Logistics Request type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Request


Group


Job

columns.name: REQ_TEMPLATE_TASK_ID
columns.description: The Logistics Task Template this Request is linked to. This Task defines the meaning of this Request and provides configuration info for the Request.

columns.name: REQ_TEMPLATE_TASK_ID_TASK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the task.

columns.name: REQ_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This Logistics Request's UTC start instant.

columns.name: REQ_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This Logistics Request's priority.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Stat


High


Normal


Low

columns.name: REQ_START_PLF_ID
columns.description: This Logistics Request's start location. If only one location is defined in the linked Logistics Task, it will be stored here.

columns.name: REQ_DYNAMIC_START_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This Logistics Request's dynamic start location type. This indicates what changes (like updates to the patient's bed or current location) will update the Request's start location.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Specified Location


Current Location


Current Bed

columns.name: REQ_END_PLF_ID
columns.description: This Logistics Request's end location.

columns.name: REQ_DYNAMIC_END_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This Logistics Request's dynamic end location type. This indicates what changes (like updates to the patient's bed) will update the Request's end location.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REQ_DYNAMIC_START_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: REQ_TECHS_NUM
columns.description: The number of Logistics Technicians required to work on this Logistics Request.

columns.name: REQ_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This Logistics Request's mode. Technicians need to use this mode to complete this Request.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REQ_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status of this Logistics Request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unplanned


Planned


Assigned


Acknowledged


At Start Location


In Progress


At End Location


Completed


Canceled

columns.name: REQ_CANCEL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
When this Logistics Request's status is Canceled, this item contains the Request's cancel reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Automatically Canceled (Default) 


Linked Appointment Canceled


Linked Admission PND Canceled


Linked Discharge PND Canceled


Linked Transfer PND Canceled


Linked LOA Out PND Canceled


Linked LOA Return PND Canceled


Planned Break Canceled


Reducing Required Technicians


Canceled By Utility


Linked Transport Request Canceled


Linked ADT Event Canceled


Maintenance Clean Replaced By Bed Clean


Linked Bed Clean Canceled (Room Clean)


Linked Appointment Time Changed


Canceled by Contact Move


Linked Appointment Department Changed


Linking To Adjacent Appointment In Department


Linked Appointment Patient No Show 


Linked Appointment Patient Left Without Being Seen

columns.name: REQ_START_APPT_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the appointment that this Logistics Request is going to.

columns.name: REQ_END_APPT_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the appointment this Logistics Request is coming from.

columns.name: REQ_ADMISSION_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the admission this Logistics Request is associated with.

columns.name: REQ_PEND_ID
columns.description: The Pending Event linked to this Logistics Request.

columns.name: REQ_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The event linked to this Logistics Request.

columns.name: REQ_FIRST_STAGE_HLR_ID
columns.description: The Logistics Request that serves as the first stage of this Multi-Stage Request.

columns.name: REQ_NEXT_STAGE_HLR_ID
columns.description: The Logistics Request that serves as the next stage of this Multi-Stage Request.

columns.name: REQ_STAGE_NUM
columns.description: The stage number for this Logistics Request.

columns.name: REQ_IS_CONCURRENT_STAGE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if this Logistics Request can be worked on concurrently with the previous stage.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: REQ_REGION_SEC_ID
columns.description: The Logistics Region that this Logistics Request belongs to.

columns.name: REQ_REGION_SEC_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: REQ_SECTOR_SEC_ID
columns.description: The Logistics Sector that this Logistics Request belongs to.

columns.name: REQ_SECTOR_SEC_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: REQ_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The Department that this Logistics Request belongs to.

columns.name: REQ_HOSP_LOC_ID
columns.description: The Hospital Location that this Logistics Request belongs to.

columns.name: REQ_SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The Service Area that this Logistics Request belongs to.

columns.name: REQ_CREATION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether this Logistics Request was created manually or automatically, and if created automatically, which automatic process created the Request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Automatic - Appointment


Automatic - Ready To Move


Automatic - Scheduled TSK


Automatic - Action


Automatic - Maintenance Clean


Manual - Multiple Maintenance Clean


Automatic - Bed Type


Automatic - Room Clean


Automatic - ADT Event

columns.name: REQ_PAT_ID
columns.description: The Patient (EPT) linked to this Logistics Request.

columns.name: REQ_BED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This Logistics Request's associated bed type. This indicates that a bed of this type is being moved with this Request. When this Request is completed, the destination's bed type will be updated to this bed type. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Empty


Standard


Crib


Telemetry


Bariatric

columns.name: REQ_FUNC_COMP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant that a Logistics Request can be considered functionally complete in UTC.

columns.name: REQ_ACTIVATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that a Logistics Request is eligible to be assigned.

columns.name: REQ_START_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: This Logistics Request's local start instant.

columns.name: REQ_FUNC_COMP_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant that a Logistics Request can be considered functionally complete in local time.

columns.name: JOB_ACT_LINK_LOCATION_EVNT_ID
columns.description: The Patient Location Event record created by the Update Patient Location action on this Logistics Request.

columns.name: REQ_TASK_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Subtype of the request, used to broadly classify the type of request this is.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Transport


Bed Clean


Maintenance Clean


Other

columns.name: REQ_BED_ID
columns.description: For Bed Clean and Maintenance Clean requests, this is the ID of the bed being cleaned.

columns.name: REQ_BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_OUTGOING_EVENT_ID
columns.description: For Bed Clean requests, this is the ID of the outgoing event prior to the bed clean.

columns.name: NEXT_INCOMING_EVENT_ID
columns.description: For Bed Clean requests, this is the ID of the incoming event immediately following the bed clean.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status category ID for the hospital logistics request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: PRIMARY_LINKED_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the primary event linked to this Logistics request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Start Location Appointment


End Location Appointment


Admission


Pending Admission


Pending Transfer


Pending Discharge


Pending LOA Out


Pending LOA Return


Transfer


Discharge


LOA Out
